trans-unit.source: Operational Insights dashboards
trans-unit.target: Operational Insights dashboards

trans-unit.source: Informational article on basic dashboard usage for Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Informational article on basic dashboard usage for Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: Operational Insights dashboards
trans-unit.target: Operational Insights dashboards

trans-unit.source: This guide helps you understand how Operational Insights Dashboards can visualize all of your saved log searches, giving you a single lens to view your environment.
trans-unit.target: This guide helps you understand how Operational Insights Dashboards can visualize all of your saved log searches, giving you a single lens to view your environment.

trans-unit.source: Example Dashboard
trans-unit.target: Example Dashboard

trans-unit.source: How do I create my dashboard?
trans-unit.target: How do I create my dashboard?

trans-unit.source: To begin, go to the Azure Operational Insights Overview by clicking the Overview button on the left navigation.
trans-unit.target: To begin, go to the Azure Operational Insights Overview by clicking the Overview button on the left navigation.

trans-unit.source: You'll see the "My Dashboard" tile on the left.
trans-unit.target: You'll see the "My Dashboard" tile on the left.

trans-unit.source: Click it to drill down into your dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Click it to drill down into your dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: Adding a tile
trans-unit.target: Adding a tile

trans-unit.source: In dashboards, tiles are powered by your saved log searches.
trans-unit.target: In dashboards, tiles are powered by your saved log searches.

trans-unit.source: Operational Insights comes with many pre-made saved log searches, so you can begin right away.
trans-unit.target: Operational Insights comes with many pre-made saved log searches, so you can begin right away.

trans-unit.source: You'll see the following pictorial outlining how to begin.
trans-unit.target: You'll see the following pictorial outlining how to begin.

trans-unit.source: Pictorial
trans-unit.target: Pictorial

trans-unit.source: In the My Dashboard view, simply click on the 'customize' gear at the bottom of the page to enter customize mode.
trans-unit.target: In the My Dashboard view, simply click on the 'customize' gear at the bottom of the page to enter customize mode.

trans-unit.source: The panel that opens on the right side of the page shows all of your workspace's saved log searches.
trans-unit.target: The panel that opens on the right side of the page shows all of your workspace's saved log searches.

trans-unit.source: Add Tiles 1
trans-unit.target: Add Tiles 1

trans-unit.source: To visualize a saved log search as a tile, just drag it onto the empty space to the left.
trans-unit.target: To visualize a saved log search as a tile, just drag it onto the empty space to the left.

trans-unit.source: As you drag it will turn into a tile.
trans-unit.target: As you drag it will turn into a tile.

trans-unit.source: Add Tiles 2
trans-unit.target: Add Tiles 2

trans-unit.source: Add Tiles 3
trans-unit.target: Add Tiles 3

trans-unit.source: Edit a tile
trans-unit.target: Edit a tile

trans-unit.source: In the My Dashboard view, simply click on the 'customize' gear at the bottom of the page to enter customize mode.
trans-unit.target: In the My Dashboard view, simply click on the 'customize' gear at the bottom of the page to enter customize mode.

trans-unit.source: Click the tile you want to edit.
trans-unit.target: Click the tile you want to edit.

trans-unit.source: The right panel changes to edit, and gives a selection of options:
trans-unit.target: The right panel changes to edit, and gives a selection of options:

trans-unit.source: Edit Tile
trans-unit.target: Edit Tile

trans-unit.source: Tile visualizations
trans-unit.target: Tile visualizations

trans-unit.source: There are two kinds of tile visualizations to choose from:
trans-unit.target: There are two kinds of tile visualizations to choose from:

trans-unit.source: Bar Chart
trans-unit.target: Bar Chart

trans-unit.source: This displays a timeline of your saved log search's results, or a list of results by a field depending on if your log search aggregates results by a field or not.
trans-unit.target: This displays a timeline of your saved log search's results, or a list of results by a field depending on if your log search aggregates results by a field or not.

trans-unit.source: Metric
trans-unit.target: Metric

trans-unit.source: This displays your total log search result hits as a number in a tile.
trans-unit.target: This displays your total log search result hits as a number in a tile.

trans-unit.source: Metric tiles allow you to set a threshold that will highlight the tile when the threshold is reached.
trans-unit.target: Metric tiles allow you to set a threshold that will highlight the tile when the threshold is reached.

trans-unit.source: Threshold
trans-unit.target: Threshold

trans-unit.source: You can create a threshold on a tile using the Metric visualization.
trans-unit.target: You can create a threshold on a tile using the Metric visualization.

trans-unit.source: Select on to create a threshold value on the tile.
trans-unit.target: Select on to create a threshold value on the tile.

trans-unit.source: Choose whether to highlight the tile when the value is over or under the chosen threshold, then set the threshold value below.
trans-unit.target: Choose whether to highlight the tile when the value is over or under the chosen threshold, then set the threshold value below.

trans-unit.source: Organizing the dashboard
trans-unit.target: Organizing the dashboard

trans-unit.source: To organize your dashboard, navigate to the My Dashboard view and click on the 'customize' gear at the bottom of the page to enter customize mode.
trans-unit.target: To organize your dashboard, navigate to the My Dashboard view and click on the 'customize' gear at the bottom of the page to enter customize mode.

trans-unit.source: Click and drag the tile you want to move, and move it to where you want your tile to be.
trans-unit.target: Click and drag the tile you want to move, and move it to where you want your tile to be.

trans-unit.source: Organize your Dashboard
trans-unit.target: Organize your Dashboard

trans-unit.source: Remove a tile
trans-unit.target: Remove a tile

trans-unit.source: To remove a tile, navigate to the My Dashboard view and click on the **customize** gear at the bottom of the page to enter customize mode.
trans-unit.target: To remove a tile, navigate to the My Dashboard view and click on the **customize** gear at the bottom of the page to enter customize mode.

trans-unit.source: Select the tile you want to remove, then on the right panel select **Remove Tile**.
trans-unit.target: Select the tile you want to remove, then on the right panel select **Remove Tile**.

trans-unit.source: ![Remove a Tile](./media/operational-insights-use-dashboards/remove-tile.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Remove a Tile](./media/operational-insights-use-dashboards/remove-tile.png)
